name: Anergy
description:
In "Anergy" you have to get your batteries to a recharging station at the end before they run out of power. Transfer power between your batteries to solve puzzle but be careful. Your batteries are joined together by a energy beam and breaking line of sight will cause the batteries to lose power.  Batteries with higher power jump higher and move faster. Use this to your advantage.

Controls: Move "a" "d" jump: "space"

transfer energy to selected battery: "E"

switch battery: "left Mouse"

reset level: "R"
